item.title: META
item.description: score:3 Chances: Meta Platforms, Inc. has a strong position in the social media industry with its Family of Apps segment, including popular platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp. The company’s focus on developing technology for connecting people and growing businesses shows potential for continued growth and expansion.

item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:152 Chances: The potential ban of TikTok in the US could create market share opportunities for platforms like YouTube and Snap Inc. If ByteDance is forced to divest from TikTok, Meta Platforms is the most obvious candidate to acquire it, which could further strengthen its dominance in social media advertising.
